item.title: c++98 ã§ is_integral å®Ÿè£…
item.description: 1. ã¯ã˜ã‚ã« c++98 ã§ STL ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒŠã‚’è‡ªä½œã™ã‚‹ã¨ãã« is_integral ã‚’å®Ÿè£…ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã£ãŸã®ã§ä»Šå›ã¯ãã®ã¾ã¨ã‚ã§ã™ã€‚ 2. is_integral ã¨ã¯ cppreference.com ã‚ˆã‚Š //Defined in header <type_traits> namespace std { template <class T> struct is_integral; template <class T> inline constexpr bool is_integral_v = is_integral<T>::value; // C++17 } Checks whether T is an integral type. Provides the member constant value which is equal to true, if T is the type bool, char, char8_t (since C++20), char16_t, char32_t, wchar_t, short, int, long, long long, or any implementation-defined extended integer types, including any signed, unsigned, and cv-qualified variants.
